Sinopse: Suburban mum Rachel is devastated when her daughter Dina commits suicide. Forced to realize that she and Dina were not as close as she thought, Rachel sets out to retrace the last few days of her life and makes some painful discoveries. A nude photo intended only for her boyfriend had gone viral and the bullying was tearing her apart. Then in the midst of her investigation Rachel starts receiving anonymous threats herself.
